moreBlocks.lawyersAtD'Oliveira&Associates,P.C.Selec: • Gouveia, Robin On a Super Lawyers® List

moreBlocks.articles:
• d'Oliveira & Associates opens office in Woonsocket, RI, Personal Injury Blog, November 1, 2014
    d’Oliveira & Associates’ new Woonsocket, RI Personal Injury Law Office is located at 62 Hamlet Avenue, Woonsocket, RI 02895. The move will enable the Firm to maintain closer contact with its clients in the Woonsocket, RI area.
  • Coventry Workers’ Compensation Lawyer, d'Oliveira & Associates Website
    If you have been injured while working in Coventry, you may be eligible for workers’ compensation benefits consisting of lost wages, medical bills, job retraining and in some cases a lump sum settlement, among other losses.
  • Coventry Motorcycle Accident Lawyer, d'Oliveira & Associates Website
    Our firm has been successfully handling motorcycle accident cases now for over 26 years. If you or a loved one has been injured in a motorcycle accident, you may be entitled to compensation.
  • Experienced RI Dog Bite Lawyer, d'Oliveira & Associates Website
    If you have or a loved one has been bitten by a dog in Rhode Island, you may be able to be compensated, as many dog owners have homeowner’s insurance to pay your medical bills, lost income, scarring and pain and suffering.
  • Coventry Slip and Fall Lawyer, d'Oliveira & Associates Website
    If you have been injured as a result of a slip and fall accident, you may be able to obtain a cash settlement for your medical bills, lost income and pain and suffering, among other losses.

description:
Serving Rhode Island And Massachusetts

From our law office in Coventry, Rhode Island, the attorneys at d'Oliveira & Associates P.C. serve clients throughout Kent County and the surrounding region who need help recovering the finances they need to support themselves and their families.

With 15 offices across Rhode Island and Massachusetts, our law firm which is one of the largest in the region is devoted exclusively to personal injury, Social Security Disability and workers' compensation law.

A Long History Of Advocating For Those In Need

Since 1989, when experienced attorney Paul d'Oliveira established our practice, we have secured over $200 million on behalf of those suffering from an injury or loss caused by another party's negligence, and we have helped hundreds of disabled workers obtain their rightful compensation and benefits.

When working with our law firm, you can expect to receive dedicated attention from a highly rated and experienced attorney committed to providing the highest level of advocacy possible.

Compassionate, Effective Counsel

Our attorneys genuinely care about our clients' needs and goals, and we work hard to obtain the maximum amount possible for your injury and loss as well as for your pain and suffering so that you can focus on your recovery and rebuilding your future.

To discuss your situation with one of our legal professionals, you can contact d'Oliveira & Associates P.C. at our Coventry law office to schedule an appointment for a free initial consultation.
